languages.text: "Ты — ксенос, странная и непонятная. А люди стремятся познать новое, ибо неизвестность пугает больше".

traits.locale_text: а что ты хотела? ты ксенос

languages.text: "You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."
languages.original_text: "Ты — ксенос, странная и непонятная. А люди стремятся познать новое, ибо неизвестность пугает больше".

traits.locale_text: "You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And people strive to get to know the unknown, because the unknown is more frightening."
"You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And people strive to get to know the unknown, because the unknown is more frightening."
"You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."
"You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."
"You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."

languages.text: “对于人类来说，你是异形，是未知的陌生生物。人类会不断尝试理解未知，因为未知才是最可怕的东西。”
languages.original_text: "You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."

traits.locale_text: “对于人类来说，你是异形，是未知的陌生生物。人类会不断尝试理解未知，因为未知才是最可怕的东西。”

languages.text: «Eres una xenos, una criatura extraña y desconocida. Y los seres humanos nos esforzamos por comprender lo desconocido, pues lo desconocido es lo que más nos aterra».
languages.original_text: "You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."

traits.locale_text: «Eres una xenos, una criatura extraña y desconocida. Y los seres humanos nos esforzamos por comprender lo desconocido, pues lo desconocido es lo que más nos aterra».

languages.text: « Vous êtes une xénos, une créature étrange et inconnue. Les humains cherchent à comprendre l'inconnu, car c'est la chose la plus terrifiante à leurs yeux. »
languages.original_text: "You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes une xénos, une créature étrange et inconnue. Les humains cherchent à comprendre l'inconnu, car c'est la chose la plus terrifiante à leurs yeux. »

languages.text: "Ihr seid eine Xenos, eine fremde und unbekannte Kreatur. Und Menschen wollen das Unbekannte verstehen, denn es gib nichts Furchterregenderes als das Unbekannte."
languages.original_text: "You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid eine Xenos, eine fremde und unbekannte Kreatur. Und Menschen wollen das Unbekannte verstehen, denn es gib nichts Furchterregenderes als das Unbekannte."

languages.text: 「お前は異種族であり、奇妙かつ未知の生物だ。そして人間は未知なるものを理解しようと努力する。それは我々が未知なるものを最も恐れているからだ」
languages.original_text: "You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は異種族であり、奇妙かつ未知の生物だ。そして人間は未知なるものを理解しようと努力する。それは我々が未知なるものを最も恐れているからだ」

languages.text: "Sen bir zenosun, tuhaf ve bilinmeyen bir yaratıksın. İnsanlar bilinmeyeni anlamaya çalışır çünkü bilinmeyen, her şeyden daha korkunçtur."
languages.original_text: "You are a xenos, a strange and unknown creature. And humans strive to understand the unknown, for the unknown is the most frightening thing of all."

traits.locale_text: "Sen bir zenosun, tuhaf ve bilinmeyen bir yaratıksın. İnsanlar bilinmeyeni anlamaya çalışır çünkü bilinmeyen, her şeyden daha korkunçtur."
